topics.topic: FWS: How to Build a Language

notes.note: Please note: 4-credit option is offered only for the Writing in the Majors component of COGST 1101 (inc. PSYCH 1102, LING 1170, PHIL 1910, CS 1710).

course.subject: LING
course.course_title: History of the English Language to 1300

notes.note: Permission required after first week of classes.
Prerequisite: 1 year prior Sanskrit study or permission of instructor.
Prerequisite: SPAN 2190 or CASE Q++ or permission of instructor
Prerequisite: LING 1101 or permission of instructor.

course.subject: LING
course.class_descr: History of the Romance Lang II

notes.note: Prerequisite: LING 3303 or permission of instructor.
Prerequisite: Exposure to linguistics at the level of LING 1101 and experience with data structures at the level of CS 2110.
Prerequisite: senior standing or permission of instructor.
